title: Woodrow Wilson hardened Senate opposition to th...

content.question: Woodrow Wilson hardened Senate opposition to the Treaty of Versailles by his refusal to compromise on the issue of

choices.label: reparations limited to the amount Germany could afford to pay
plebiscites to determine the new borders of Germany
the border between Italy and Yugoslavia
protectorate status for African colonies seized from Germany
the unconditional adherence of the United States to the charter of the League of Nations

content.answer: the unconditional adherence of the United States to the charter of the League of Nations

topic.text: 7.5: World War I - Military and Diplomacy

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
